name: decypharr
description: Decypharr is a self-hosted vulnerability scanner focused on web applications. It provides simple scanning for common exploits via a modern UI, making security checks accessible for developers and small teams.
features: Vulnerability Scanning: Detect common web application exploits. Proactive security testing.
Modern Interface: Clean UI for managing security scans. User-friendly security tools.
Developer-Friendly: Accessible security checks for small teams. No security expertise required.
Automated Testing: Schedule regular security assessments. Continuous protection.
Report Generation: Detailed findings with remediation guidance. Actionable security insights.
Self-Hosted: Keep security scan data private. Your vulnerabilities, your control.
